list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: used to single out one person, thing, or situation over all others.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he despised them all, especially Sylvester
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông coi thường tất cả, đặc biệt là Sylvester

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: to a great extent; very much.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy không đặc biệt thích khiêu vũ
